FAQ Section.Layout: Single-column layout for text header followed by a two-column grid for FAQ items.
FAQ Section.Design: Clean and organized with clearly defined question and answer pairs. Questions are placed within rounded cards that include a subtle border and padding.

Key Elements.Section Header: Centered with a bold headline and a brief descriptive text below it.
Key Elements.Question Cards: Each card has a question at the top, often with an icon, followed by the answer.
Key Elements.Icons: Accompanying each question for visual interest and quick identification.
Key Elements.Two-Column Grid: Ensures that multiple FAQs can be displayed without overwhelming the user.

FAQ Section.Use Cases: Ideal for any website needing to address common inquiries, including product pages, service descriptions, and customer support sections.
